name: Fall (itch) (SafeTCam)
description:
Fall is a platformer made for the GMTK Game Jam, 2018. 

The theme of the jam was "Genre without Mechanic", and so Fall is a Platformer, without movement controls or jumping.

As the grey square, you must fall to the orange square. You have unlimited attempts, and no time limit. 

When A Platformer Has No Movement Controls, All You Can Do Is Fall.
